price: 78. Nacaladdayda baana korkaaga ah ilaa Maalinta Is-Abaal marinta (Qiyaamada).
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ لَعۡنَتِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka laʿnatī ilā yawmi al-dīni
